takes.text: Hey there, Mamaroneck and Larchmont! Your favorite local guide is back with the hottest happenings around town. Get ready to mark your calendars because we've got a fantastic lineup of events that are sure to bring some sparkle to your week, running from September 20th to September 27th, 2025!

First up, get ready to unleash your inner artist at the T-Shirt Design Contest happening at the Mamaroneck Public Library! Starting September 24th, teens can dive into a world of creativity and design their very own masterpiece. It’s free to enter, so grab your pens and let your imagination soar!

Next, for all you little nature lovers and their grown-ups, get ready for Little Sprouts – Fall Fun at the Sheldrake Environmental Center! Starting Thursday, September 25th, at 10 AM, you can explore 60 acres of protected land, discover local wildlife, and enjoy nature-inspired activities. Best of all, it's absolutely free for two-year-olds with an adult caregiver!

On Monday, September 29th, at 10 AM, the Larchmont Public Library is hosting a Drop-in Coloring Hour! Children aged two and up, accompanied by their caregivers, can enjoy a relaxing time with crayons and coloring sheets. No registration needed, just drop in and get colorful!

Also on Monday, September 29th, at 12 PM, for all you game enthusiasts, head over to the Larchmont Public Library for Open Play Mahjong and Canasta! Whether you're a seasoned player or just know the basics, you're welcome to join. Bring your own sets or use the library's. It's a fantastic way to meet new people and have some fun!

And finally, to wrap up our exciting week, on Monday, September 29th, at 3:45 PM, the Larchmont Public Library presents Afternoon Stories & Craft! Linnea or Kristi will be leading some fun stories and an accompanying craft for children and their caregivers. Registration is required, so don't miss out on this creative adventure!
That's all for this week's event roundup! Get out there, have a blast, and make some amazing memories in our wonderful community. We'll catch you next time with more exciting events!
